results.idea: Short-term price momentum (21-day) scaled by volatility
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION1 by combining price returns and short-term volatility. SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3: if coverage low, ts_backfill(close,5) is recommended; I note it but not included to keep implementation short (KEEP_IN_MIND1). SUGGESTION4: prefer high-use fields like close. Kept operators under limit (KEEP_IN_MIND2). Confidence set to 0.75 because short-term momentum is robust historically.

results.idea: Mean reversion: price minus 5-day moving average
results.description: Used multiple fields conceptually but kept to price to keep implementation concise (SUGGESTION1 partial). No vector fields (SUGGESTION2 N/A). If close has missingness, apply ts_backfill(close,5) (SUGGESTION3 noted). Respect KEEP_IN_MIND2. Confidence 0.65 due to intraday/short-term mean reversion evidence.

results.idea: Cross-sectional 1-month momentum (ranked zscore)
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION1 by ranking returns cross-sectionally. No vector fields used. Kept operators low to respect KEEP_IN_MIND2. I would use ts_returns(close,21) and quantile/ zscore to form cross-sectional signal. Confidence 0.78; momentum is strong cross-sectionally.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by market beta (risk-adjusted momentum)
results.description: Combines returns and beta (two fields) per SUGGESTION1. No vector fields. If beta coverage low, use ts_backfill(beta,20). Limited operators per KEEP_IN_MIND2. Confidence 0.7 because adjusting momentum for beta improves information ratio.

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum (post-earnings drift)
results.description: Uses earnings surprise and price returns (SUGGESTION1). Some earnings fields have low coverage; recommend ts_backfill(earn_surprise,60) per SUGGESTION3. No vector fields used. KEEP_IN_MIND2 complied. Confidence 0.72 due to documented post-earnings drift.

results.idea: Volume-accelerated momentum (returns * volume zscore)
results.description: Applies SUGGESTION1 by combining returns and volume. SUGGESTION2 N/A. If volume sparse, ts_backfill(volume,5) suggested. Operators limited. Confidence 0.68 as volume-confirmed moves often persist.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after extreme intraday moves
results.description: Combines high-low range and returns (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. KEEP_IN_MIND2 respected. Suggest ts_zscore(log(high/low),5) to detect extremes. Confidence 0.6; intraday reversals have modest signal.

results.idea: Price gap mean reversion (open vs previous close)
results.description: Uses open and close (SUGGESTION1). If open data gaps exist, ts_backfill(open,3). Operators kept small per KEEP_IN_MIND2. Confidence 0.64; gap reversion is a known short-term effect.

results.idea: Cross-sectional volatility-targeted momentum
results.description: Combines cross-sectional ranking with volatility normalization (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. Uses quantile and divide to scale by ts_std_dev. KEEP_IN_MIND2 observed. Confidence 0.73 for improved risk-adjusted returns.

results.idea: Mean reversion on liquidity spikes (high volume then reversal)
results.description: Uses volume and returns (SUGGESTION1). If volume coverage low, recommend ts_backfill(volume,5). Implementation concise. Confidence 0.61 as liquidity-driven reversals have moderate edge.

results.idea: Relative strength vs sector (sector-neutral momentum)
results.description: Uses stock returns and sector group for neutralization (SUGGESTION1 and GROUP usage). KEEP_IN_MIND4 applied: group used as group parameter in group_neutralize. Limited operators. Confidence 0.76 because neutralizing sector improves signal.

results.idea: Short interest surge mean reversion
results.description: Combines short_interest and recent returns (SUGGESTION1). Short interest may have low coverage — ts_backfill(short_interest,30) suggested. Operators limited. Confidence 0.59 due to behavioral short squeezes and covering dynamics.

results.idea: Analyst upgrade momentum (revision-driven)
results.description: Uses analyst revisions and returns (SUGGESTION1). Analyst data often sparse; apply ts_backfill(analyst_rev,90) if needed. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.67; revisions drive price trends.

results.idea: Price momentum filtered by institutional ownership changes
results.description: Combines ownership delta and returns (SUGGESTION1). Ownership data low-frequency; use ts_backfill(inst_own_delta,90). KEEP_IN_MIND2 respected. Confidence 0.66 since flows matter.

results.idea: Volatility breakout: recent realized vol spike leads to continuation
results.description: Uses ts_std_dev of returns and returns itself (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. If vol series sparse, ts_backfill(ts_std_dev(ts_returns(close,21),21),21). Confidence 0.62; breakouts sometimes persist.

results.idea: Carry-like signal using dividend yield vs peers
results.description: Combines dividend_yield and group neutralization vs industry (SUGGESTION1 and GROUP use). Dividend data can be sparse — ts_backfill(dividend_yield,180) suggested. Confidence 0.58; carry has long-term modest alpha.

results.idea: Profitability momentum: change in ROE
results.description: Uses fundamental ROE and its ts_delta (SUGGESTION1). Fundamentals are low-frequency — recommend ts_backfill(roe,365). Operators kept few. Confidence 0.6 because signals are slower but persistent.

results.idea: Accruals mean reversion (low accrual firms outperform)
results.description: Uses accruals and price (SUGGESTION1). Accruals may be sparse; ts_backfill(accruals,365) suggested. Implementation simple per KEEP_IN_MIND2. Confidence 0.63 from accounting anomalies literature.

results.idea: Quality-momentum blend: gross margin improvement
results.description: Combines gross_margin delta and returns (SUGGESTION1). Fundamental coverage caveat handled by ts_backfill(gross_margin,365). Operators limited. Confidence 0.66 due to combining quality and momentum.

results.idea: Seasonal monthly momentum (calendar month effect)
results.description: Uses ts_step or month indicator plus returns (SUGGESTION1 conceptual). No vector fields. KEEP_IN_MIND2 kept. Confidence 0.55; seasonal effects are weaker but exploitable.

results.idea: Price-to-book mean reversion (value factor)
results.description: Uses pb_ratio (fundamental) and reverse to create value signal (SUGGESTION1). pb may be missing for some; ts_backfill(pb_ratio,365) suggested. Simple implementation. Confidence 0.68 historically robust.

results.idea: Growth momentum: earnings revision trend
results.description: Combines forward EPS revisions and returns (SUGGESTION1). Revisions often sparse—ts_backfill(eps_rev,180) recommended. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.67 due to consensus revision predictive power.

results.idea: High turnover anomaly: stocks with rising volatility then reversal
results.description: Uses turnover (volume/shares) and return reversal (SUGGESTION1). If turnover sparse, ts_backfill(turnover,20). KEEP_IN_MIND2 satisfied. Confidence 0.58; turnover-induced reversals are modest.

results.idea: Cross-asset relative momentum (stock vs index)
results.description: Uses stock returns and index returns (SUGGESTION1). If index missing for some universes, ts_backfill(index_close,5). Limited operators. Confidence 0.7; relative strength vs benchmark is effective.

results.idea: Implied volatility skew exploitation (IV vs realized)
results.description: Combines implied_vol (option data) and realized vol to identify mispricing (SUGGESTION1). Option data low coverage—use ts_backfill(implied_vol,30). Operators concise. Confidence 0.65; options mispricings can persist.

results.idea: Pairs mean reversion via price ratio zscore
results.description: Uses two correlated tickers' closes (SUGGESTION1 cross-pair). No vector fields. Implement with ts_zscore on ratio. KEEP_IN_MIND2 observed. Confidence 0.66 for classic pair trading.

results.idea: Liquidity-provision alpha: bid-ask spread mean reversion
results.description: Uses spread and recent returns (SUGGESTION1). Spread data may be sparse—ts_backfill(spread,5). Operators minimal. Confidence 0.57; microstructure effects are niche but real.

results.idea: Momentum confirmation via funds flow (ETFs/ownership flows)
results.description: Combines fund_flow and returns (SUGGESTION1). Flow data low-frequency—ts_backfill(fund_flow,90). Keep operators limited. Confidence 0.64 due to flows reinforcing trends.

results.idea: Seasonal earnings momentum (post-quarter pattern)
results.description: Uses earnings_date indicator and returns after event (SUGGESTION1). Earnings dates sparse; ts_backfill(earnings_date,90). Limited operators. Confidence 0.62 from post-earnings drift seasonality.

results.idea: Cross-sectional low-volatility premium
results.description: Ranks stocks by ts_std_dev(returns) and long low vol (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. KEEP_IN_MIND2 applied. Confidence 0.69 historically persistent.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by insider buying
results.description: Combines insider_buy signal with returns (SUGGESTION1). Insider data sparse; ts_backfill(insider_buy,180) suggested. Keep operators few. Confidence 0.65 as insider buys are informative.

results.idea: Trend strength via ts_ir (information ratio) momentum
results.description: Uses ts_ir over medium-term returns per SUGGESTION1. No vector fields. ts_ir handles noise; KEEP_IN_MIND2 met. Confidence 0.71 since IR captures trend consistency.

results.idea: Cross-sectional dispersion breakout
results.description: Uses sector dispersion (group_std_dev) and select stocks in high-dispersion sectors (SUGGESTION1 and GROUP usage). Coverage note: group fields likely dense (SUGGESTION4). Operators under limit. Confidence 0.6 for dispersion-driven opportunities.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by earnings volatility
results.description: Combines returns and ts_std_dev of earnings surprises (SUGGESTION1). Earnings surprise series sparse—ts_backfill(earn_surprise,180). Keep operators short. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after high kurtosis days
results.description: Uses ts_kurtosis on returns and short reversal (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. ts_kurtosis can be noisy; confidence 0.54. KEEP_IN_MIND2 observed.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on macro surprise (macro-sentiment overlay)
results.description: Combines macro surprise indicator and stock returns (SUGGESTION1). Macro series may be low freq — ts_backfill(macro_surprise,90). Implementation concise. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Relative value using EBITDA/EV vs peers
results.description: Uses ebitda_ev and group neutralization (SUGGESTION1, GROUP). Fundamental coverage low-frequency; ts_backfill(ebitda_ev,365). Operators minimal. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum on option-implied skew steepening
results.description: Combines change in implied_skew and underlying returns (SUGGESTION1). Option data sparse — ts_backfill(implied_skew,30). Implementation short. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Cross-sectional reversal using quantile buckets
results.description: Uses bucket of recent returns and reverses extremes (SUGGESTION1). Kept within operator limit using bucket and reverse. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum with turnover control (hump operator)
results.description: Applies momentum but limits turnover via hump (SUGGESTION1 & KEEP_IN_MIND2). No vector fields. Confidence 0.7 due to practical turnover management.

results.idea: Mean reversion in analyst sentiment scores
results.description: Uses analyst_sentiment and reversal (SUGGESTION1). Sentiment may be sparse—ts_backfill(analyst_sentiment,90). Operators minimal. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum combined with balance sheet improvement
results.description: Combines ts_delta(current_ratio,252) and returns (SUGGESTION1). Fundamentals low-frequency; ts_backfill recommended. Operators concise. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Earnings quality filter: momentum only when accruals low
results.description: Applies momentum but filters by low accruals (SUGGESTION1). Uses if_else and reverse. Accrual data may be sparse—ts_backfill(accruals,365). Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Cross-sectional growth anomaly: low asset growth outperform
results.description: Uses asset_growth and reverse per SUGGESTION1. Asset growth is low-frequency—ts_backfill(asset_growth,252) suggested. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on FX moves for ADRs
results.description: Combines ADR returns and FX returns (SUGGESTION1). FX coverage usually good (SUGGESTION4). Limit operators. Confidence 0.62 for currency-sensitive equities.

results.idea: High-frequency micro-structure: orderbook imbalance vector average
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION2 by using a vector order_book imbalance and vec_avg. SUGGESTION1 used multiple fields conceptually. If coverage <0.6, ts_backfill(order_book,5). KEEP_IN_MIND2: one vector field and one op. Confidence 0.55 due to noisy microstructure signals.

results.idea: Momentum with volatility targeting (scale by recent vol)
results.description: Combines returns and ts_std_dev to volatility target (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. Operators kept minimal. Confidence 0.72 for improved Sharpe.

results.idea: Cross-sectional earnings momentum (ranked revisions)
results.description: Ranks earnings revisions and multiplies by returns (SUGGESTION1). Revisions low-freq; ts_backfill recommended. Operators limited. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Liquidity-adjusted value: PB scaled by turnover
results.description: Combines pb_ratio and turnover (SUGGESTION1). If turnover sparse, ts_backfill(turnover,20). Few operators used. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum divergence (ts_arg_max)
results.description: Uses ts_arg_max on returns to detect recent leaders; combine cross-sectionally (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. KEEP_IN_MIND2 ok. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Short squeeze detection: sudden short_interest drop + price pop
results.description: Combines short_interest delta and returns (SUGGESTION1). Short_interest may be sparse—ts_backfill advised. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum on cash flow improvement
results.description: Uses operating_cash_flow delta and returns (SUGGESTION1). Fundamentals rare—ts_backfill recommended. Operators concise. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Cross-sectional cheapness via PEG ratio reversion
results.description: Uses peg_ratio and reverse (SUGGESTION1). PEG low-frequency—ts_backfill(peg_ratio,365). Operators minimal. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by ESG score improvements
results.description: Combines ESG_delta and returns (SUGGESTION1). ESG series can be sparse—ts_backfill(esg_score,365). Operators minimal. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Cross-sectional risk parity tilt: overweight low beta momentum
results.description: Combines beta and momentum to overweight low beta winners (SUGGESTION1). Beta coverage generally good (SUGGESTION4). Operators kept low. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Momentum with group neutralization and winsorization
results.description: Uses ts_returns and group_neutralize, then winsorize to limit outliers (SUGGESTION1 and GROUP usage). KEEP_IN_MIND2 observed. Confidence 0.72 for pragmatic alpha.

results.idea: Liquidity momentum: rising free float and positive returns
results.description: Combines free_float_delta and returns (SUGGESTION1). Free float data low-freq—ts_backfill suggested. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on credit spread improvement
results.description: Combines corporate_spread delta and equity returns (SUGGESTION1). Credit data sparse—ts_backfill(spread,90). Operators concise. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Cross-sectional mean reversion in analyst target price divergence
results.description: Uses target_price - close and reverses (SUGGESTION1). Target price sparse—ts_backfill(target_price,90). Operators limited. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum with turnover floor using trade_when
results.description: Uses ts_returns but only trades when turnover above threshold (SUGGESTION1). Employs trade_when to control positions (KEEP_IN_MIND2). Confidence 0.69 for implementability.

results.idea: Short-term reversal on unusually low bid depth (vector avg)
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION2: vec_avg on order_book.bid_depth to detect low depth then reverse. If order book coverage <0.6, ts_backfill advised. KEEP_IN_MIND2 respected. Confidence 0.52 (noisy).

results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum with group_scale normalization
results.description: Uses group_scale to normalize momentum within industry (SUGGESTION1 & GROUP). Keeps operators limited. Confidence 0.71 due to better cross-sectional comparability.

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum scaled by company size
results.description: Combines earn_surprise and market_cap (SUGGESTION1). If earnings sparse, ts_backfill recommended. Operators few. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on commodity price moves for commodity-exposed firms
results.description: Combines firm returns with commodity returns (SUGGESTION1). Commodity coverage typically good. KEEP_IN_MIND2 observed. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Volatility timing: go long momentum only when market realized vol low
results.description: Combines market realized vol and stock momentum (SUGGESTION1). Market vol coverage good; operators minimal. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Dividend surprise momentum: announce increase then momentum
results.description: Uses dividend_change indicator and returns (SUGGESTION1). Dividend events sparse—ts_backfill(dividend_change,180). Operators minimal. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Cross-sectional liquidity-adjusted momentum (group_count weight)
results.description: Uses group_count to adjust weights for sector liquidity (SUGGESTION1 & GROUP). group_count improves coverage (SUGGESTION4). Operators limited. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum decay optimization using hump operator
results.description: Uses hump to smooth momentum weights (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. KEEP_IN_MIND2 observed. Confidence 0.7 for turnover-efficient momentum.

results.idea: Cross-sectional residual momentum from factor regression
results.description: Conceptually regress returns on factors and take residual momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied to combine factors; implementation kept abstract to respect brevity (KEEP_IN_MIND1). Confidence 0.69.
results.implementation: ts_regression(ts_returns(close,63), factor_returns,252, lag=0, rettype=0) /* use residual */

results.idea: Momentum on supply chain upgrades (supplier/customer signals)
results.description: Uses supply_chain_sentiment and returns (SUGGESTION1). Supply chain data sparse—ts_backfill recommended. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Cross-sectional quality filter: momentum only on high FCF yield firms
results.description: Combines fcf_yield filter and returns (SUGGESTION1). FCF yield low-freq—ts_backfill(fcf_yield,365). Operators concise. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Mean reversion using ts_av_diff of returns
results.description: Uses ts_av_diff to detect deviations from recent mean (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. Operators limited. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum across market-cap buckets (bucketed rank)
results.description: Uses bucket on market cap and rank within buckets (SUGGESTION1 & GROUP-like). KEEP_IN_MIND2 respected. Confidence 0.68 for size-aware momentum.

results.idea: Earnings revision momentum with group neutralization
results.description: Combines eps revisions and group_neutralize to remove industry effects (SUGGESTION1 & GROUP). ts_backfill for revisions if sparse. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum stabilized by winsorize
results.description: Applies winsorize to momentum to reduce outliers (SUGGESTION1). Operators minimal. Confidence 0.7 for robustness.

results.idea: Momentum combined with balance sheet deleveraging (lower leverage)
results.description: Combines leverage delta and returns (SUGGESTION1). Leverage data low-frequency—ts_backfill recommended. Operators limited. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Cross-sectional reversal in high dispersion days
results.description: Detect days of high market dispersion (group_std_dev) then apply reversal cross-sectionally (SUGGESTION1 & GROUP). Operators concise. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by macro regime (trend-following in expansion)
results.description: Combines macro_regime and returns (SUGGESTION1). Macro regime low-frequency—ts_backfill suggested. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Short-term reversal on abnormal option flow (net buy pressure)
results.description: Uses option_flow net buys and reverses price movement (SUGGESTION1). Option_flow coverage may be limited—ts_backfill(option_flow,30). Operators kept small. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by analyst coverage breadth
results.description: Weights momentum by number of analysts covering (SUGGESTION1). Analyst counts often stable (SUGGESTION4). Operators minimal. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Cross-sectional carry: yield curve exposure vs peers
results.description: Uses duration or interest rate sensitivity and yields (SUGGESTION1). Data coverage varies—ts_backfill recommended. Operators concise. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum with group_rank and scale
results.description: Ranks within groups and scales to compare across industries (SUGGESTION1 & GROUP). KEEP_IN_MIND2 satisfied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Mean reversion using days_from_last_change on signal
results.description: Use days_from_last_change to detect stale signals and revert. SUGGESTION1 applied conceptually. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.55 due to heuristic nature.

results.idea: Momentum on gross domestic exposure (country FX-adjusted)
results.description: Combines stock returns with country FX moves (SUGGESTION1). FX coverage good. KEEP_IN_MIND2 observed. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Cross-sectional low-beta reversal
results.description: Reverse signals among low-beta stocks using beta filter (SUGGESTION1). Beta coverage high (SUGGESTION4). Operators limited. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum with group_neutralize and winsorize for robustness
results.description: Combines group_neutralize and winsorize on momentum (SUGGESTION1 & GROUP). KEEP_IN_MIND2 observed. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Momentum in small-caps with liquidity threshold
results.description: Combines market_cap filter and turnover threshold (SUGGESTION1). Use trade_when to enforce liquidity (KEEP_IN_MIND2). Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Cross-sectional growth-quality long-short
results.description: Long stocks with improving growth and quality metrics, short the opposite (SUGGESTION1). Fundamentals low-freq—ts_backfill needed. Operators limited. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_target_tvr_decay to control turnover
results.description: Uses ts_target_tvr_decay to tune turnover while keeping momentum core (SUGGESTION1). Operators within limit. Confidence 0.71 for practical deployment.

results.idea: Cross-sectional reversal after large insider selling
results.description: Detect heavy insider selling and look for mean reversion (SUGGESTION1). Insider data sparse—ts_backfill(insider_sell,180). Operators concise. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum on supply-demand imbalance from block trades
results.description: Uses block_trade_flow and returns (SUGGESTION1). Block trades sparse—ts_backfill(block_trade_flow,30). Operators minimal. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Cross-sectional carry in FX hedged equities (dividend minus hedging cost)
results.description: Combines dividend_yield and hedging_cost (SUGGESTION1). Hedging cost data may be sparse—ts_backfill suggested. Operators limited. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum signal stabilized by ts_scale across time
results.description: Applies ts_scale to momentum to reduce regime shifts (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. KEEP_IN_MIND2 observed. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Cross-sectional residual from ts_regression onto liquidity factor
results.description: Regress returns on liquidity factor and use residuals as alpha (SUGGESTION1). Use ts_regression; keep concise. Confidence 0.65.
results.implementation: ts_regression(ts_returns(close,63), turnover,252, lag=0, rettype=0) /* use residual */

results.idea: Momentum with adaptive lookback using ts_arg_max
results.description: Detect lookback where returns peaked with ts_arg_max and adapt momentum window (SUGGESTION1). Implementation kept short. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after sudden analyst downgrades
results.description: Use analyst_downgrade events and apply short-term reversal (SUGGESTION1). Analyst events sparse—ts_backfill recommended. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum augmented by cash surprise (cash beats expectations)
results.description: Combine cash surprise and returns (SUGGESTION1). Cash surprise sparse—ts_backfill suggested. Operators concise. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Cross-sectional price momentum with group_count weighting
results.description: Weight cross-sectional momentum by group_count to avoid small groups dominating (SUGGESTION1 & GROUP). KEEP_IN_MIND2 met. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorize and normalize pipeline
results.description: Apply winsorize then normalize to reduce outliers and cross-sectional mean (SUGGESTION1). Operators within limits. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Mean reversion on margin compression signals
results.description: Track gross_margin delta and reverse when compression evident (SUGGESTION1). Margins low-freq—ts_backfill suggested. Operators concise. Confidence 0.58.
